import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './Destination.css'; import DestinationItem from './DestinationItem'; import './ModalStyle.css'; import { Modal } from "./Modal"; function DestinationContent() { const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false); const openModal = () => { setShowModal(true); }; return (

Check out these EPIC Destinations!

    {showModal ? : null}
); } export default DestinationContent;
